attributes.action: Make prisons less like a holiday camp and more like a punishment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We are petitioning to take all the home comforts out of prisons. all privialges to be removed (TV's, games consoles, gyms, internet connections, luxury foods/menus, coffee/tea etc -they are of no nutritional value and cost the tax payer money-, and prisoners should be made to work hard 6 days a week. At the end of the cut down it our aim that the only luxury items prisoners have is paperback books, writing paper, pens and pencils, and access to a library and education facilities.
if you agree prison should be a punishment and not a holiday, please join me and sign here!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
